sentences.en: A waiter mopped up the mess as best he could.
sentences.cn: 一名侍者尽力抹掉溅出的食物。

sentences.en: an error like that could easily mess up an entire day's work.
sentences.cn: 那样的错误会使一整天工作轻易付诸东流。

sentences.en: Cars are driven through the mess, splashing everyone in range.
sentences.cn: 车从脏水里驶过，溅了周围所有人一身水。

sentences.en: Except for the remarkably tidy kitchen, the place was a mess.
sentences.cn: 除了厨房特别干净外，这地方一片狼藉。

sentences.en: Finally, making a dreadful mess, they devour the fruit.
sentences.cn: 最后，他们狼吞虎咽地吃起了水果，果汁滴得到处都是。

sentences.en: got messed up in a brawl.
sentences.cn: 在吵闹中打斗起来

sentences.en: He hurried to the Mess to find the control officer.
sentences.cn: 他匆忙赶到餐厅去找指挥官。

sentences.en: He keeps forgetting the words and the song is a sprawling mess.
sentences.cn: 他老是忘词，歌被唱得乱七八糟。

sentences.en: He scratched his head and messed his hair even more.
sentences.cn: 他挠挠头，把头发弄得更乱了。

sentences.en: I have to get to the bottom of this mess.
sentences.cn: 我必须查清造成这一混乱局面的真正原因。

sentences.en: I was unhappy and really messed up.
sentences.cn: 我不开心，情绪极差。

sentences.en: liked to mess around with pals on days off.
sentences.cn: 喜欢休息日与朋友们厮混

sentences.en: Linda can't stand mess.
sentences.cn: 琳达无法忍受脏乱。

sentences.en: Look what a mess you've made of your life.
sentences.cn: 看看你把自己的生活都弄成什么样子啦。

sentences.en: messed up and dropped the ball.
sentences.cn: 慌慌张张把球掉了

sentences.en: My life’s such a mess .
sentences.cn: 我的生活一团糟。

sentences.en: She hates mess.
sentences.cn: 她讨厌到处乱糟糟的。

sentences.en: She'd got herself into a mess, of that he was certain.
sentences.cn: 他肯定她已经让自己陷入了困境。

sentences.en: Sorry – the place is a bit of a mess .
sentences.cn: 对不起——这里有些乱。

sentences.en: stop messing with things you don't understand.
sentences.cn: 别再管你不懂的事了。

sentences.en: That seems like a horrible mess that will drag on for years.
sentences.cn: 看起来那像是个会拖延多年的大烂摊子。

sentences.en: The car was left a mess of twisted metal.
sentences.cn: 车子成了一堆扭曲的金属。

sentences.en: The house is in a mess after a wild party.
sentences.cn: 狂欢聚会后，屋里一片狼藉。

sentences.en: the minister messed around with health, and look at the state we are in.
sentences.cn: 部长插手了卫生工作，看看我们如今的状况。

sentences.en: The truth is, I'm in one heck of a mess.
sentences.cn: 事实上我麻烦大了。

sentences.en: The wrong shampoo can leave curly hair in a tangled mess.
sentences.cn: 不合适的洗发水会使卷发纠结成乱糟糟的一团。

sentences.en: We had lunch in the officers’ mess .
sentences.cn: 我们在军官食堂吃了午饭。

sentences.en: What a mess!
sentences.cn: 太乱了！

sentences.en: When I got home, the house was a complete mess .
sentences.cn: 我回到家时，屋子里一片狼藉。

sentences.en: You can make cookies if you promise not to make a mess in the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 如果你答应不把厨房搞得乱七八糟，你可以去做甜饼。

words.tran_cn: 凌乱的，散乱的；肮脏的，污秽的；麻烦的
混乱；食堂，伙食团；困境；脏乱的东西
把事情弄糟；制造脏乱；玩弄

phrases.tran_cn: 制造混乱；搞成一团糟；[口]拉屎
胡闹；瞎混；闲逛，浪费时间；粗鲁对待某人
浪费时间；一片狼籍；弄混
(美，非正式)使泄气；使担忧；使苦恼

trans.tran_cn: 脏乱，困境，不整洁，粪便，许多，(军队的)餐厅
trans.tran_en: if there is a mess somewhere or a place is a mess, things there are dirty or not neatly arranged

trans.tran_cn: 弄乱，随地便溺，在军人餐厅就餐
trans.tran_en: to make something look untidy or dirty

trans.tran_cn: 弄糟， 弄脏， 搞乱
trans.tran_en: to make something look untidy or dirty
